title: Looking for Casual or Ranked Team/Group
body:
looking for a ranked team or just casual friends to play league with. I'm a gold 1 adc main but can fill if needed, prefer team with voice chat :) 

Add me in game: titan2ten

replies.body: I play {{champion:122}} top and {{champion:107}} jungle, only in bronze though but that doesn't make me toxic or bad just less experienced. I would be up for casual games not really a competitive person (might explain why i'm in bronze) don't have voice chat but if your willing add me, cheers.
